ModMetaData.name: Glowpods Use Darklight
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img]
A simple patchmod that makes glowpods count as darklight. For those insect+darkness meme plays.
Safe to add/remove from save. Requires Ideology.
Idea by: Valliecane
